head.supplied: 22/5/83. ¶ ¶ An other addition to the S.A. Flora is to be mentioned, dear Prof. Tate; it is Pteris arguta Aiton (P. tremula, R.Br). It occurs among plants just received from the kind and circumspect ...

div.p: Barr Smith Library, University of Adelaide, SA.

An other addition to the S.A. Flora is to be mentioned, dear Prof. Tate; it is Pteris arguta Aiton (P. tremula, R.Br). It occurs among plants just received from the kind and circumspect Mrs Richards, who gathered it 5 miles from Streaky Bay.
